body_html: I think we should remove both copies. The only reason I had outputs copy was because there wasn't a great way to avoid it without writing more pybind wrappers. Now that we (apparently) have to add pybind wrappers anyway, we might as well make both not copy. I am OK with inputs() and outputs() being views ArrayRef's make the fact that it is a view clear in the type signature.

body: I think we should remove both copies. The only reason I had outputs copy was because there wasn't a great way to avoid it without writing more pybind wrappers. Now that we (apparently) have to add pybind wrappers anyway, we might as well make both not copy. I am OK with inputs() and outputs() being views ArrayRef's make the fact that it is a view clear in the type signature.
